com.nokia.maps.common

Class ConnectionMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nokia.maps.common.ConnectionMonitor

  • public final class ConnectionMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class collections information and statistics about network activity. If you wish to keep track of data sent and received by your application you may use the methods herein to update the data counters. You may also register a listener that is celled immediately before a connection is made and immediately after the last connection is closed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ConnectionMonitor getInstance()
      This method retrieves the singleton instance of the ConnectionMonitor.
      ConnectionListener getListener()
      This method retrieves a ConnectionListener which is used to receive notifications at the start and end of network activity.
      long getTotalReceived()
      This method retrieves the total data received thus far.
      long getTotalSent()
      This method retrieves the total data sent thus far.
      long getTotalSentAndReceived()
      This method retrieves the total data sent and received thus far.
      void notifyReceived(long number)
      This method is called by anything that does any network activity, in order to increment the received byte counter.
      void notifySent(long number)
      This method is called by anything that does any network activity, in order to increment the sent byte counter.
      void setListener(ConnectionListener listener)
      This method sets a ConnectionListener that is notified of connection events.
